Some Simple Primary Button

This are some simple primary buttons with onclick


CSS

button {
height: 60px;
width: 200px;
background-color: #FF0000;
color: #FFFFFF;
text-align: center;
text-decoration: none;
display: inline-block;
font-size: 18px;
margin: 4px 2px;
border-radius: 5px;
border-style: solid;
border-color: #FF0000;
cursor: pointer;
{
button:hover {
background-color: #CC0000;
color : #FFFFFF;
border-color: #CC0000;
{

HTML

<simple-button>#FF0000<simple-button>
